servinfo.title: Engine noise – Piston, ring and cylinder noise
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

paragroup.ptxt: Engine noise – Piston, ring and cylinder noise

attention3.ptxt: Before checking mechanical noise, make sure that:

ps.ptxt: Worn piston, ring and cylinder bore

action.ptxt: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
